attributes.action: Close down Ofgem and pass all its powers to a new Energy Watch(as you  wrongly scrapped old one) .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: And to not employ any Board members or advisors from Ofgem as they have shown themselves to not be acting in the Public interest, as well as a sizeable amount of them are too close to the Utility Companies due to former conections.(a FACT).
